categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Zarius was a male Human Jedi Master. He was present on Ilum in 3640 BBY.

Master Zarius appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a non-player character in the Republic mission "Ilum Under Siege," which features several characters from the Republic class storylines. Zarius was actually cut from the Jedi Consular storyline; he was intended to appear on Coruscant.
